definitions.definition: Joyful , glad , taking pleasure in being alive; not depressed or sad.
examples: The lighthearted young lovers ran over the hills.

definitions.definition: Enjoyably lacking of seriousness, not grave .
examples: His lighthearted banjo performance was appreciated because it relieved the tension in tight situations.

main_definition: Joyful , glad , taking pleasure in being alive; not depressed or sad.
secondary_definitions: Enjoyably lacking of seriousness, not grave .
